EmailTemplate.description: Email used to send a notice to SFAR submitter to let them know their request was rejected by the business approver.
EmailTemplate.name: SFAR Business Approval - Request Rejected
EmailTemplate.subject: SFDC Access Request Approval was rejected by Business Approver - {!SFDC_Access_Request__c.Program__c} - {!SFDC_Access_Request__c.User_Region__c}
